name: SS Sara
author: Kimon Papadimitriou
body:
Historie

The Italian steamship SARA, en route from Catania for Patras, was wrecked at Punta Rocha, Fano Island (sic. Othonoi) (perhaps Akra Boka, Othonoi, Corfu) whilst carrying a cargo of cement.

Read more at wrecksite: https://www.wrecksite.eu/wreck.aspx?178871

Beschrijving

Vermogen187 pk
Snelheid9 knopen ~ 16 km/u (10 mijl per uur)
Lengte260 ¼ voet (79,3 m)
Breedte37 ½ voet (11,4 m)
Diepgang16 ½ voet (5 m)
Tonnage1731 ton

Status

The shipwreck was designated as a monument in 2024, according to the Law 4858/2021 (https://diavgeia.gov.gr/doc/65%CE%A4%CE%9946%CE%9D%CE%9A%CE%9F%CE%A4-5%CE%A8%CE%A0?inline=true).
